<details><summary> Setup üîß‚òëÔ∏è</summary>  

# Setup  

## Step 1   
#### Open `Drawer` to fully extended position.    
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/117060318/237524872-b7e87c56-334a-47e0-9c79-333a830ee138.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..yKyEnxjfE6DFKDpBYBJWcb5rBK8avDNTHGEFGIE7ito)


## Step 2  
#### Install `C-clamp` as shown.
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/117060318/237524884-27cdc25b-2fc7-42ec-b663-31f99de59594.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Vi2kunhlOsufMINtkHqiknxdYXZmmptw-rI4ETOvbhc)


>**Note**
>Take care to ensure that `C-clamp` is centered on the `lock face` and tightened securely enough to elimate any play once installed.
  
## Step 3
#### Install `Luggage scale` onto `C-clamp` as shown.
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/117060318/237524906-0710aaf9-5a03-45de-9f3f-51ae1cdc18c3.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..KJFK37hf3aJwPUFH2D6VIjzF-MC1rcOpRdNmGcFlI60)


>**Note**
>Be sure to attach the `Luggage scale` strap within the jaw portion of the `C-clamp`, closest to the `Drawer` outer face.
  
## Step 4
#### Zero out luggage scale before testing.
![Step 4 - Zero out scale](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/117060318/237491340-894ccec1-7b76-457f-a724-4f58dc6f159a.GIF?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..na50I68KeBJVM4fdbOx4uo-rzhAYbaIuBOxme1M7e6k)
>**Note**
>Turn black knob counterclockwise to zero out `Luggage scale` as shown.
  
</details>
  
 ---  
 
 <details><summary> Testing üß™‚òëÔ∏è</summary>   
  
 # Testing
 
 #### 1.  Pull/push downward on `Luggage scale` handle gradually increasing force until `Desk` begins to tip and rear legs lift.
 >**Note**
 >Recommend kneeling down directly in front of the `Desk` and applying force with only 1 hand on the handle (palm downward).  Take care to pull/push directly downward parallel to the `Drawer` face as pulling in an off-angle will affect the readings.
 
 #### 2.  Release tension on the `Luggage scale` immediately to avoid `Desk` actually tipping.
 #### 3.  The black needle on the `Luggage scale` will indicate the MAX weight recorded during the test.
 #### 4.  Repeat as needed.
 >**Note**
 >Be sure to re-zero the `Luggage scale` [SEE [Step 4](#step-4) in [Setup](#setup)] and make sure Drawer is fully open and contents haven't shifted before each test.
 
 
 
### Pull/Push Testing example:
[https://github.com/KOV-IPC-MECH-1/RDS-Desk--Tipping-Test-Guide--C-Sample-Desk--10MAY2023/assets/117060318/1f3ec421-d80d-4ca7-8d90-3f664e14bd6f](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/117060318/237506482-1f3ec421-d80d-4ca7-8d90-3f664e14bd6f.MP4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Qhk5KyRjdLifZz_qS-5E_Zdhz1cSHslG1nkYr2r9Qps)
